tokenInfo.title: YES Token Information
tokenInfo.subtitle: Learn about YesCoin's detailed information and economic model

fairLaunch.title: Fair Launch Philosophy
fairLaunch.description: YesCoin adopts a 100% community distribution model with no team allocation, no private sale, and no pre-mining. All tokens are fairly distributed to users through community activities, task completion, NFT minting, etc., ensuring equal opportunities for every participant.

trading.title: Trading Mechanism
trading.description: Based on BSC network smart contracts, supporting decentralized trading. Tokens can be freely traded on DEX platforms like PancakeSwap, with liquidity provided and maintained by the community, low transaction fees, and fast transfer speeds.

liquidity.title: Initial Liquidity Source
liquidity.description: Initial liquidity at project launch will be provided through NFT minting revenue. Each Guardian NFT minting revenue will be proportionally injected into the YesCoin/BNB trading pair, providing a stable liquidity foundation for the token.

future.title: Future Development Plan
future.description: As the ecosystem develops, YesCoin will gradually introduce staking mining, liquidity mining, governance voting and other DeFi functions. Holders can earn more rewards by participating in ecosystem construction while enjoying project governance rights.

fairDistribution.title: üéØ Fair Distribution
fairDistribution.description: No pre-mining, no private sale, 100% community fair distribution

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Common questions and answers about the YesCoin project to help you better understand our vision and technology

whatIsYesCoin.question: What is YesCoin?
whatIsYesCoin.answer: YesCoin is a community-driven token project based on the BSC network. We are committed to creating real value for users through fair distribution, zero transaction fees, and rich ecosystem applications. The project adopts a 100% community distribution model with no team allocation, ensuring that every participant can fairly obtain tokens.

howToBuy.question: How to buy YesCoin tokens?
howToBuy.answer: You can obtain YesCoin through the following ways: 1) Complete daily tasks and challenges to earn rewards; 2) Participate in community activities and promotion; 3) Mint Guardian NFTs to get token rewards; 4) Buy directly on DEX platforms like PancakeSwap. We recommend new users to first familiarize themselves with the project through the task system.

nftUtility.question: What are the uses of Guardian NFT?
nftUtility.answer: Guardian NFT is a core component of the YesCoin ecosystem, and holders enjoy multiple benefits: 1) 20% staking mining bonus; 2) Extra rewards for airdrop tasks; 3) Community governance voting rights; 4) Exclusive activity participation qualifications; 5) Priority access to future DeFi functions. Each NFT has unique rare attributes and pixel art design.

tokenomics.question: What is the token economic model?
tokenomics.answer: YesCoin adopts a deflationary economic model: total supply of 100 billion tokens, 100% distributed through community activities. Token uses include: ecosystem governance voting, staking mining, NFT minting, transaction fee deduction, etc. We ensure stable token value growth through various mechanisms, including buyback and burn, liquidity locking, etc.

governance.question: How to participate in community governance?
governance.answer: Users holding YesCoin tokens or Guardian NFTs can participate in community governance: 1) Submit improvement proposals; 2) Participate in voting decisions; 3) Join community discussions; 4) Contribute code and ideas. We adopt a decentralized governance model where major decisions are decided by community voting, ensuring project development serves the interests of all participants.

security.question: How is project security guaranteed?
security.answer: We highly value project security: 1) Smart contracts professionally audited; 2) Liquidity permanently locked; 3) Multi-signature wallet management; 4) Regular security checks and updates; 5) Transparent fund usage reports. All code is open source and subject to community supervision, ensuring long-term stable project development.

support.question: How to get technical support?
support.answer: We provide multi-channel technical support: 1) Official Telegram group for real-time Q&A; 2) Discord community technical discussions; 3) Official website online customer service system; 4) GitHub technical documentation and FAQ; 5) Regular AMA events. Our technical team is online 7x24 hours to ensure user issues are resolved promptly.

roadmap.question: What is the future development plan?
roadmap.answer: YesCoin's development roadmap includes: Q1 - Improve infrastructure and NFT system; Q2 - Launch staking mining and liquidity mining; Q3 - Develop chain games and metaverse applications; Q4 - Cross-chain bridging and multi-chain deployment. We are committed to building a complete Web3 ecosystem to provide users with diversified application scenarios.
